channel.title: Home on Capyloon, Reclaim Your Web!
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Capyloon, Reclaim Your Web!

item.title: Desktop
item.description: .flex-container { flex-direction: row; display: -webkit-flex; display: flex; width: 100%; align-content: center; flex-flow: row wrap; } .flex-item { width: 20%; order: 1; margin: 1em; } @media only screen and (max-width: 600px) { .flex-item { width: max-content; } Homescreen Quick Settings Latest Activity Installed Apps Terminal App Carousel View Image Processing Plugins uBlockOrigin Panel Page Information Split Screen Mode

item.title: Phone
item.description: .flex-container { flex-direction: row; display: -webkit-flex; display: flex; width: 100%; align-content: center; flex-flow: row wrap; } .flex-item { width: 20%; order: 1; margin: 0em 1em; } @media only screen and (max-width: 600px) { .flex-item { width: max-content; } } Mobile Lockscreen Mobile Homescreen Mobile quick settings Mobile Latest Activity Mobile installed apps Mobile Carousel View Mobile uBlockOrigin Panel Mobile Page Information
